extendedInfo.description: THE ONE TOOL EVERY DRIVER NEEDS. My Firestone, the free app from Firestone Complete Auto Care, keeps track of maintenance milestones and service recommendations from your carâs manufacturer. And it helps you find cheap gas, remember your parking spot, track your mileage, contact roadside assistance, shop for tires, schedule service appointments, download service records, and more. Whatever you drive, drive a Firestone.+ SEE THE FUTURE â Be alerted to upcoming maintenance milestones and recommendations, straight from your carâs manufacturer.+ SEE THE PAST â Access the details of each and every Firestone Complete Auto Care service visit in your vehicleâs history â right from your mobile device.+ SCHEDULING, SIMPLIFIED â Maximize your time: schedule a service appointment right from the app.+ STORE FINDER â No matter where you are, use My Firestone to locate the Firestone Complete Auto Care most convenient for you â closest to home, closest to work, or wherever your drive may take you.+ MONEY SAVERS â Get special offers to keep your car running newer, longer.+ PUMP PROTECTION â My Firestone uses GPS to find the cheapest gas near you, wherever you may roam.+ MILEAGE TRACKER â Let My Firestone know youâre filling up your tank, and the app will provide tips on how to maximize your gas.+ PARKING REMINDER â Never forget where you parked again.+ ROADSIDE AID â 24/7/365, My Firestone will find you roadside help if you need it. And we offer a list of safety tips for if you are stranded.+ Find Tires â Find the perfect tire, right from the My Firestone app.

reviews.title: What I was looking for today!
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for today! Able to download my service data from Firestone a plus! 5 stars when I can use it in Landscape orientation! That is my only problem!
reviews.author: Yuro S

reviews.title: Finally a useful app
reviews.comment: Amazing app that serves it\'s purpose. So easy to use. I just entered my car description and the app downloaded my vehicle\'s service history in 10 seconds.  Outstanding and must have if you service with FIRESTONE!
reviews.author: Scott Powers

reviews.comment: Dodge ram is not on list of vehicles.  Apparently this app is limited to cars only.\tThey need to add more than cars.
reviews.author: Mark King

reviews.title: Doesn\'t have Chevrolet for 2013
reviews.comment: The app is pretty useless if you can\'t add your vehicle, and there are a lot of manufacturers missing if you select 2013.
reviews.author: Arthur Word

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: Its a very good app for my 2006 Saturn but it doesn\'t show any Chevy Silverados between 1995-1998.  Please add
reviews.author: Jason Pittmon

reviews.title: Ok app
reviews.comment: Good app but 2013 cars are not in yet. How am i gonna use it if i can\'t add my car? 2013 Subaru crossteck
reviews.author: Elia Clemente

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I get a LOT of work done on my cars at Firestone. This is a great way to keep all your vehicle history in one place. Only complaint is the oldest vehicle you can add is 1983 which is a big problem for me cuz I have 1978 & 1972 Chevy trucks and a 1967 Mustang. But at least I can keep track of my 2003 Caddy.
reviews.author: Diana Southard

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: All my service records can be downloaded. Appointment can also be scheduled via this app. Simply wow...
reviews.author: Geso Karaage

reviews.title: Maintenance Record s not Up To Date
reviews.comment: On three of my cars I had service s performed within Nov 2012 and Jan 2013 which do not show as of April 2 2013.  How long before App and database is synced.
reviews.author: Robert abelson

reviews.title: Fantastic app!
reviews.comment: Love this app. Everything you need for your car
reviews.author: Erik Anderson

reviews.title: Pretty sweet app
reviews.comment: This is a pretty sweet app for car maintenance records and vehicle maintenance
reviews.author: Dustin Boyd

reviews.title: Not so much..
reviews.comment: This application works great if you use strictly Firestone to do all of your repairs but it has no export feature should you add any additional work by other sources which means that you lose your data.
reviews.author: Duane Brown

reviews.title: Saved me $220
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app right after dropping my truck off for routine maintenance and also baught the lifetime wheel balance... I thought my wife purchased it before but it did not register at this particluar firestone... I pulled records from past firestone maintenance performmed from throughout the southeast region, and it showed the lifetime balance that my wife purchased in Feb 2012... I showed this to the manager, and he took immediate action!!! He merged my maintnce records.. app works and saved me $$$
reviews.author: Joseph Parker

reviews.title: HTC EVO
reviews.comment: This app is SO much more than I expected ..  Not only can you set an appointment but it contained all my past maintenance history.  Excellent
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs minor improvement.
reviews.comment: It\'s a little disappointing that they don\'t list their Expert Tire stores with this app. They\'re a part of the Firestone chain of auto service stores. Frustrating I cannot use my service record history because of this. Please fix this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Downloaded previous maintenance for all of my vehicles allows you to know when the last time you got your oil changed can schedule appointments even reminds me where I parked  good job
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost Perfect
reviews.comment: A very nice app.  Surpised at it\'s features and helps you find your parked car.  Can\'t beat that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not quite working
reviews.comment: This doesn\'t work for me...I don\'t know why. I added my CRV but for some reason its not giving me the maintenance...
reviews.author: A Google User
